amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: None of the funds in this Act may be used for Roosevelt University Biology Laboratory Equipment (IL).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds for Roosevelt University Biology Laboratory Equipment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A043) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A043) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
